test.name: Verify That An EPOL Pass Holder Can See The 'No Record Found' Error Prompt When Enter The Special Pass FIN

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Set Appium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout in seconds used by various keywords.

kw.name: Enter FIN M3000018X And Check The Error Prompt
kw.sourcename: Enter FIN ${fin} And Check The Error Prompt

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Click Element ${enterFinTile} ${SMALL_RETRY_COUNT}
kw.doc: Click on a given element ...

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Input Text ${finTextBox} ${fin} ${SMALL_RETRY_COUNT}
kw.doc: Input text on a given text box ...

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Set Variable

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible

kw.msg: xpath criteria: //*[@text='No Record Found'] xpath criteria: //*[@text='No Record Found'] xpath criteria: //*[@text='No Record Found']

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg:
${errorMessageLocator} = xpath=//*[@text='This app only works for checking MOM-issued passes.
For MOM-issued Special Passes, you will need to scan the QR code on your card to check pass details and validity.']

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.
kw.msg:
xpath criteria: //*[@text='This app only works for checking MOM-issued passes.
For MOM-issued Special Passes, you will need to scan the QR code on your card to check pass details and validity.']

kw.name: Quit Application
kw.doc: *DEPRECATED!!* in selenium v4, check `Close Application` keyword.
kw.msg: Keyword 'AppiumLibrary.Quit Application' is deprecated. in selenium v4, check `Close Application` keyword.
